criteria.location: Australia preferred, global acceptable if relevant

prospects.name: Nay Sakya
prospects.audience: Aspiring players, parents seeking elite training
prospects.whyFit: Australian-based trainer working with elite levels. His audience wants serious development — exactly CourtLab's target. Position as tool for his players to track progress between sessions.
prospects.reachoutAngle: Offer CourtLab as player homework tool — track shots, vertical, drills between his training sessions. Affiliate commission on players who subscribe.

prospects.name: Dodo Elyazar
prospects.whyFit: Perfect alignment — targets U12-U18, exactly CourtLab's core. Running Australia tour Jan 2026. His audience is parents investing in their kids' basketball development.
prospects.reachoutAngle: CourtLab as camp companion — every kid gets verified combine data at his camps. White-label partnership for his tour.

prospects.name: Tyler Leclerc
prospects.niche: Skills trainer + Facility Owner + Coach Business Growth
prospects.whyFit: Micro-influencer with business angle. He helps coaches grow their business — CourtLab fits that narrative (tool to professionalize coaching). Lower follower count = higher trust.
prospects.reachoutAngle: CourtLab as business tool for coaches — adds revenue stream, professionalizes offering. Affiliate for his coach audience.

prospects.name: Camille LeNoir
prospects.audience: Female players, parents of daughters, point guards
prospects.whyFit: Unique angle — female trainer, focuses on confidence/mindset. Appeals to girls' basketball market (huge growth area). Different from typical 'dunk highlight' accounts.
prospects.reachoutAngle: CourtLab for her 'DREAM' program students — track improvement, build confidence through data. Women's basketball focus aligns with Hoops & Her.

prospects.name: Garry Linton
prospects.contentType: Parent education, college recruitment, fixing youth sports
prospects.audience: Parents of serious youth players (especially boys)
prospects.whyFit: Strong parent-focused message — 'Youth Sports is Broken.' He helps parents navigate the system. CourtLab fits perfectly (data = objective truth, no politics).
prospects.reachoutAngle: CourtLab as the antidote to youth sports politics — 'Stop guessing, start tracking.' His D1 Dad credibility + our data = powerful combo.

prospects.name: Coach Russ
prospects.whyFit: Micro-influencer focused on helping coaches run better practices. CourtLab = tool they can use with their players. Very targeted audience.
prospects.reachoutAngle: CourtLab for his coach community — player tracking without the admin headache. Affiliate for coaches who want to add value.

prospects.name: Tony Miller
prospects.audience: Youth coaches, PE teachers, skill developers
prospects.whyFit: Educational focus — coaches trust him for methodology. College coach credibility. CourtLab fits as 'next step' after his drills.
prospects.reachoutAngle: CourtLab to track outcomes of his small-sided games — 'Are your players actually improving?' Data to validate his methods.

prospects.name: Matt Hackenberg
prospects.contentType: X's and O's, offensive concepts, strategy breakdowns
prospects.whyFit: Smart, analytical content — attracts thinking coaches. CourtLab's data approach aligns with his analytical style.
prospects.reachoutAngle: CourtLab as the 'stats layer' to his strategy content — 'Know your plays AND your numbers.' Affiliate for his coach audience.

nextActions.notes: Current list is US-heavy. Need more AU-based creators under 50k.
Running AU tour Jan 2026 — timing is perfect. U12-U18 focus = exact fit.

nextActions.action: Check engagement rates on shortlisted creators
nextActions.notes: Use Modash or HypeAuditor to verify engagement quality.
Nay Sakya, Dodo Elyazar, Garry Linton — custom pitches for each.
